snippet.title: SSG Golf Blitz - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Golf Blitz is available on iOS and Android!
Play Now: http://noodlecake.games/blitz

You've never played golf like this before! Team up, challenge your friends or play online against the world to get to the top of the clubhouse. 

Play on some of the most wildly creative courses ever imagined. Customize your golfer and pack your bag with all sorts of power ups like sticky balls, grenades, lasers and more. 

Golf Blitz is an entirely new way to play the outrageously fun Race Mode from Super Stickman Golf. No cheaters. No slow pokes. ALL BLITZ! 

Features:

- Over 75 avatars to unlock with a ton of fun hats to customize your look
- Team up to play friendly matches, get your own team leaderboard and chat
- Master the many power ups all with their own upgradeable level system
- Upgrade your golfers skill set to best suit your play style
- Like to watch? Spectate live matches from all over the world
